(Program 
  (Statement 
    (ExpressionStatement 
      (Expression 
        (Object 
          (MethodDefinition 
            (StatementBlock 
              (Statement 
                (ReturnStatement 
                  (Expression 
                    (BinaryExpression 
                      (Token) 
                      (Expression 
                        (Identifier "a")) 
                      (Expression 
                        (Identifier "b"))))))) 
            (PropertyIdentifier "add") 
            (FormalParameters 
              (RequiredParameter 
                (Identifier "a")) 
              (RequiredParameter 
                (Identifier "b")))))))))
